title: Bug 124620 - Referenced Parameter icon remains valid after source parameter deletion
OB: When a source parameter in the library is deleted, the icon of the referenced parameter in the library remains valid.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the source parameter in the library is deleted, the icon of the referenced parameter should become invalid.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a library with at least one source parameter.
2. Reference this parameter in another part of the library.
3. Delete the source parameter from the library.
4. Observe the status of the icon for the referenced parameter.
